comment._content: Picton Lakes a.k.a. Thirlmere Lakes.    Caption in the corner,  Cash Photo Thirlmere.

comment.author: 75490765@N04
comment._content: A tender very much like this remains beside the line near the scene of the accident. For details of the accident, see RAILWAY COLLISION. AT PICTON LAKES. (1911, November 2). The Sydney Morning Herald (NSW : 1842 - 1954), p. 9. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article15285656
